tha-ap76:0.3_0: held together by sensual desire, illuminating, and workers.
tha-ap76:1.2_0: I stay in the host of gods,
tha-ap76:2.3_0: I bowed down with my head at the feet,
tha-ap76:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap76:4.1_0: if it is a third year;
tha-ap76:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap76:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhalliya.
tha-ap76:7.1_0: fourth part of shadow that’s grown, by senior monks.
tha-ap76:7.2_0: sixth section for recitation on the Monastic Code.
